ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rogues and bards (was Why didn't I log out sooner?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  Here s what happens when someone takes pity on me and invites me to group: 1) They attack mob 2) I get within agro radius and put my hand near
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> I've had good success grouping with rogues with my bard, my druid, my
> wizard, and my shaman. Any class that can 'get the
> attention' of another
> mob will find rogues quite valuable.

<cringe!>

Here's what happens when someone takes pity on me and invites me to group:
1) They attack mob 2) I get within agro radius and put my hand near
auto-attack key 3) mob turns on me and knocks me down to 80% heath 4) I
scream "Get it off" 5) mob gets me down to 40% health and refuses to turn
around 6) Groupmate hits mob with everything they've got (or attempts to
heal me) 7) LOADING, PLEASE WAIT...

Perhaps when I hit higher levels some class somewhere will be able to taunt
a mob off me.

Peace
Mead, outlaw of 12 convictions, Tunare
Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
